origin.\${modid}.dragonborne.name: Dragonborne
origin.\${modid}.dragonborne.description: You are a child of the Ender Dragon, like an Enderian, but more dragon than Enderman.

power.\${modid}.no_dragon_fireball_aoe_c: Dragon fireball area of effect clouds do no damage to you
